Switch

There are three inputs, "Flip", "Turn On", and "Turn Off". When you hook a Mouse Patch to "Flip", each pulse will alternate between turning the Switch patch on or off. When you hook up an interaction to "Turn On", each pulse will only turn it on. Like wise, hooking an interaction up to "Turn Off" will only turn off.

The check boxes next to each input port will pulse and lock its state until unchecked.

Switch

  • Flip
  • Turn Off
  • Turn On

Usage

Use the Flip port for interactions you want to switches between the state of (like tapping the thumbnail of an image to enlarge, and tapping again to minimize), and use the Turn On or Turn Off ports for interactions that should only go one way (like tapping to bring up a modal view, and tapping a done button to exit the modal view).

Inputs

Flip
Turn Off
Turn On

Outputs
